state_analysis: The command to perform a hard reset has been issued, which indicates that the system will restart soon. This is necessary due to the persistent unresponsiveness of the Docker environment and services. A reboot should help restore functionality to the system and clear any issues.
explanation: After the reboot, I will re-enter the system and set up the Bitcoin service from scratch to ensure everything is configured correctly. This should eliminate any previous issues that were causing the environment to become unresponsive.
